modName: HDT and Bodyslide conversion for Hunting Grounds Outfit CBBE
summary: This is a conversion of Nimezis' Hunting Grounds Outfit to HDT PE and Bodyslide with zap sliders.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]What is this?
[size=3]This is a conversion of Nimezis' Hunting Grounds Outfit (CBBE) to HDT PE and Bodyslide including zap sliders.

[size=5]Requirements
[size=2]SKSE v1.7.1 [/size][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=2]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/size][/url]
[size=2]Realistic Ragdolls and Force - realistic force [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/[/size][/url]
[size=2]XPMS Extended  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/[/size][/url]
[size=2]HDT Physics Extensions v14.28 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/size][/url]
[size=2]Hunting Grounds Outfit ( HGO_CBBE) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30466/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30466/[/url][/size]
[size=2]Bodyslide  [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/size][/url]
[size=2]CBBE v3.3 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/[/size][/url]

Installation
[size=3]Install with NMM as long as you have your Caliente Tools folder in your data folder and it contains Bodyslide.
Otherwise download manually and install in the appropriate Bodyslide folders.
Build the armors in bodyslide.
[/size]
Things to know
[size=3]Should you need assistance with installing the HDT body or creating an HDT body I will try to help you to the best of my abilities.
Resources and advice should be available on the Bodyslide mod page.

I am not using any HDT animation mods, HDT alone gives me all that is necessary.
You can try HDT animation mods or mods that alter the HDT xml file, just keep in mind this conversion was made without them.

Pay attention to any skeleton altering mods you may have installed, they may interfere with the skeleton required to make HDT work, such as Belt Fastened Quivers, there is an animation only version available.

The correct skeleton you should get by installing Realistic Ragdolls and Force first.
Then XPMS Extended, let XPMS Extended overwrite Realistic Ragdolls and Force, XPMSE should allow you to place your quivers back on your belt.

HDT Physics you should get by installing SKSE 1.7.1, look at Gophers videos for proper installation.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=37xAMUQc1oY&list=PL96C073B0B8BFC01D&index=102]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=37xAMUQc1oY&list=PL96C073B0B8BFC01D&index=102[/url]
[size=3]The video contains other things, so be patient, even though it mentions SKSE v1.7.0 it is valid for 1.7.1 regarding the memory blocks.
HDT Physics Extensions is an SKSE plugin, so that is why you need SKSE.

Extreme Bodyslide presets are not supported at this time.
I may adjust the sliders for more extreme presets in the future, however I just don't use them.
So there will be clipping on those presets.

Should you find an issue with clipping let me know, I will look into it and fix it if possible.

This mod works great with this conversion http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57859/


[size=5]Credits

[/size][/size][/size][size=3]Nimezis for the original mod and kind permission for this conversion.
VRDaphni for testing and general support.
Groovtama for XPMS Extended.
dDefinder for Realistic Ragdolls and Force.
Caliente for CBBE and Bodyslide.
Ousnius for tutorials.
Gopher for being a teacher of the best kind.
Bethesda for the best.....ish game ever made.


[size=4]My other conversion
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59267/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59267/[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61141/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61141/[/url]



[/size]

[/size][/size][/size]
author: raisuli2013
